title: Intermediate Spanish I: Foundations
description: Course is taught in Spanish, emphasizing the development of reading ability, listening comprehension, and writing skills. It includes grammar review, weekly compositions, and class discussions.  Prerequisites:  LISP 1C/1CX or LISP 1D/DX, or score of 3 on AP Spanish Language Exam, or placement result of 3 or 4 the Language Placement Exam—Spanish, or consent of instructor.
